column2: an A.M. Eatery////Service: Came here Thursday midday- 30 minutes to be seated and then another 45minutes for food to arrive. Crazy slow service- maybe growing pains of just being open? Thought the 45 minute wait for eggs was ridiculous. With the exception of our waiter
column3: the staff was not friendly. Seemed annoyed and irritated at everyone in the restaurant. Extremely unorganized.
